name: Feywild Crossing
description: A magical passage connects to the Feywild, providing access to the realm of fey magic and eternal twilight. The fey connection provides opportunities for fey magic and enchanting research, while the fey nature and potential fey threats create constant danger.
atmosphere: Silver bells chime with crystalline clarity while rainbow auroras dance overhead in impossible colors. Moonflower nectar and wild thyme create intoxicating scents in the shimmering air. Crystal shards embedded in ornate archways scatter prismatic light. Spider-silk banners woven with actual starlight flutter without any breeze.
